mcq.statement: Which two leaders signed the Lahore Declaration in 1999?

options.a: Benazir Bhutto and Atal Bihari Vajpayee
options.b: Nawaz Sharif and A. B. Vajpayee

mcq.one_liner: The Lahore Declaration in 1999 was signed by **PM Nawaz Sharif and Indian PM A. B. Vajpayee**.
